essences.name: Tides
essences.desc: The destructive inevitability of the tides against a ship.

essences.name: Hammer
essences.desc: The duality of creation and destruction in smiting.

abilities.name: Erosion
abilities.desc: Focuses on a single target. The target feels a pressure of helplessness.

combinations.name: Fracture
combinations.desc: Exploit a weak point as an attack; more awareness weak points.

combinations.name: Impact
combinations.desc: A deceptively powerful hit; greater control/coordination.

combinations.name: Pressue
combinations.desc: A variable (depends on intent) aura of a feeling of helplessness and imminent danger.

truth.name: Force
truth.desc: Control the inertia of things he's in contact with.

essences.name: Lute
essences.desc: The ability to express how he feels.

essences.name: Blue Jay
essences.desc: Notices the how his pet blue jay interacts by watching and imitating people.

essences.name: Breeze
essences.desc: Feels the calming effects of a breeze while introspecting.

abilities.name: Perform
abilities.desc: Project an emotion to others, and has an increased memory of and receptiveness to other's emotions.

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.desc: Pick up on cues in people to fit into a social situation or read an opponent's style.

abilities.name: Serenity
abilities.desc: View his emotions objectively to avoid external influences.

combinations.name: Placate
combinations.desc: Targeted aura to calm angry people.

combinations.name: Persuade
combinations.desc: Targeted aura to make people more amenable to Danny's suggestions.

combinations.name: Endear
combinations.desc: Targeted aura to make people think more highly of people.

truth.name: Charisma
truth.desc: Able to amplify or suppress existing emotions.

abilities.name: Antivenom
abilities.desc: All poisons and venoms get him drunk, rather than hurt

abilities.name: Tension
abilities.desc: Can walk on water or mud without sinking
